Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Edit Test: The first record identifier in the file must = 1 (TS). The second and all subsequent record identifiers must = 2 (LAR).
Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Error Explanation: First record identifier does not = 1 (TS) or at least one subsequent record identifier after the first record does not = 2 (LAR)

Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Edit Test: The HMDA file must contain at least one loan/application record (record identifier = 2).
Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Error Explanation: File does not contain at least one loan/application record (record identifier = 2)

Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Edit Test: Agency code must = 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 9. The agency that submits the data must be the same as the reported agency code.
Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Error Explanation: Agency code not valid for agency sending data

Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Edit Test: Control number must = a valid respondent identifier/agency code combination for date processed.
Transmittal Sheet (TS) & Loan/Applicatio.Error Explanation: Invalid respondent identifier/agency code combination or ID not on panel
Duplicate loan numbers reported; data already in file

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Activity year must = year being processed (= 2013).
Timestamp must be later than timestamp on database.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Record timestamp is earlier than, or equal to, timestamp on database (format = ccyymmddhhmm)

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Timestamp must be numeric and in ccyymmddhhmm format.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Timestamp is missing or nonnumeric (format = ccyymmddhhmm)

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Respondent name, address, city, state, and zip code must not = blank.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Respondent name, address, city, state or zip code is missing

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Respondent state code must equal a valid postal code abbreviation (i.e., AL for Alabama).
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Respondent state code is an invalid postal code

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Respondent zip code format must be NNNNN or NNNNN-NNNN and left justified.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Respondent zip code is an invalid format

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: A valid e-mail address for the institution must be provided and must be in the format of username@exampledomain.topleveldomain. The e-mail address shall not contain any spaces and must contain only one @ symbol. the e-mail address shall not contain @. .@ and .. character strings.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: E-mail address for institution is missing or is an invalid format. The e-mail address can only contain one @ symbol and must be in a format such as username@institutionname.topleveldomain. The e-mail address cannot contain '@.', '.@' or '..'. For formatting purposes, institutionname represents the institution's domain and .topleveldomain represents .com, .org, .tv, .net, .info, .name, etc. For example, hmdasubmitter@axbyczbank.com.

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: If parent name is reported, then parent name cannot equal institution name.

If respondent is a mortgage banking subsidiary (MBS) or a nondepository institution that has an affiliation with a depository institution, then parent name of the MBS or the depository institution that the nondepository institution is affiliated with along with the address, city, state and zip code must not = blank.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Parent name, address, city, state, or zip code is missing

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: If parent state code is reported, then the postal code abbreviation must be valid (i.e., AL for Alabama).
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Parent state code is an invalid postal code

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: If parent zip code is reported, then the format must be NNNNN or NNNNN-NNNN and left justified.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Parent zip code is an invalid format

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Institution Name cannot equal Contact Name.
Name of contact person must not = blank.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Name of contact person is missing

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Contact person telephone number must be in NNN-NNN-NNNN format and not blank.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Telephone number for contact person not in valid format or is missing

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Fax Number must be in NNN-NNN-NNNN format and not = blank.
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Fax Number not in valid format or is missing

Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Tax ID number must be in NN-NNNNNNN format and not = (99-9999999 or 00-0000000 or blank).
Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Tax ID number not in valid format or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Application/Loan number must not = blank or all zeros.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application/Loan number not in valid format or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Date application received must be in CCYYMMDD format; month and day must be in the range 01-12 and 01-31, respectively or equal NA. CCYY must be numeric and CC (century) must equal 19 or 20.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application Month, day, year and/or century not valid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If Action taken type = 6, then date application received must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan was purchased; therefore application date must equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If Action taken type = 6, then date application received must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan was purchased; therefore application date must equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan type must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan type is missing or is not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Property type must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Property type is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan purpose must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then loan purpose must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Control: Lien status = 3; therefore loan purpose must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Occupancy must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Occupancy is missing or does not equal 1, 2, or 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Loan amount must be numeric and > zero.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan amount is not numeric or not > 0

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Preapproval must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval is missing or is not in range 1-3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1 and action taken type = 6, then preapproval must = 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1 and action taken type = 6; therefore preapproval must = 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 2 or 3, then preapproval must = 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 2 or 3 and preapproval is missing or does not = 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 7 or 8, then preapproval must = 1.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 7 or 8 and preapproval is missing or does not = 1

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Action taken type must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type is missing or not in range 1-8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If reasons for denial are in the range 1-9, then action taken type must = 3 or 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Application or preapproval not denied, but denial reasons given

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If date application received = NA, then action taken type must = 6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Date application received = NA; therefore action taken type must = 6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 1, then action taken type must = 1-5, 7 or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 1 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-5, 7 or 8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 2, then action taken type must = 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 2 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If preapproval = 3, then action taken type must = 1-6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Preapproval = 3 and action taken type is missing or does not = 1-6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Action taken date must be in CCYYMMDD format; month and day must be in the range 01-12 and 01-31, respectively. CCYY must be numeric.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken date is invalid format and/or date

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Century (CC) and Year (YY) of action taken date must = activity century/year (CCYY) for period being processed.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Century and/or year for action taken date does not match activity century/year

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If date application received does not = NA, then action taken date must be ≥ date application received.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken date is earlier than application date

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: MSA/MD must = a valid Metropolitan Statistical Area or Metropolitan Division (if appropriate) code for period being processed or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: MSA/MD number does not = a valid Metropolitan Statistical Area/Metropolitan Division code or NA, or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: State must = a valid FIPS code or (NA where MSA/MD = NA).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: State does not = a valid state code or (state equals NA and MSA/MD not NA)

Loan/Application Register (only).Transaction Item(s): MSA/MD,State,County Codes (Columns K, L, and M)
Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If MSA/MD does not = NA, then MSA/MD, state, and county codes must = a valid combination.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: MSA/MD, state, and county codes do not = a valid combination

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: State and county must = a valid combination or (county = NA where MSA/MD = NA).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: State/county does not equal a valid combination or (county equals NA and MSA/MD not NA)

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Census tract must = a valid census tract number for the MSA/MD, state, county combination or (NA if county is classified as small) or (where MSA/MD = NA the census tract must = a valid census tract for the state/county combination or NA). Valid census tract format must be NNNN.NN or NA, left justified.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Census tract not in valid format or is missing, does not equal NA, or does not equal a valid census tract number

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant ethnicity must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity is missing or not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant ethnicity must = 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant ethnicity is missing or not in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant ethnicity does not = 5; however, co-applicant race field 1 = 8 and/or co-applicant sex = 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant ethnicity/race/sex combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3 then the first applicant race field must not = 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3; therefore first applicant race invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3 then the first co-applicant race field must not = 7 or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-applicant ethnicity = 1, 2 or 3; therefore first co-applicant race invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant race field 1 must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race field 1 is missing or is not in range 1-7

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant race = 1-5 in applicant race field 1, then all other applicant race fields must = blank or 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race fields 2 - 5 are not blank or in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If applicant race = 6 or 7 in applicant race field 1, then all other applicant race fields must = blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race field 1= 6 or 7; therefore all other applicant race fields must = blank

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant race must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,3,4,1), when more than one applicant race is designated.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant race is the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race field 1 must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race field 1 is missing or is not in range 1-8

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race field 1 does not = 8; however, co-applicant ethnicity and/or co-applicant sex = 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant race/sex/ethnicity combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant race = 1-5 in co-applicant race field 1, then all other co-applicant race fields must = blank or 1-5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race fields 2-5 are not blank or in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If co-applicant race = 6, 7, or 8 in co-applicant race field 1, then all other co-applicant race fields must = blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race field 1 = 6, 7, or 8; therefore all other co-applicant race fields must = blank

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant race must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,3,4,1), when more than one co-applicant race is designated.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant race is the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Applicant sex must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Applicant sex is missing or is not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant sex must = 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Co-Applicant sex is missing or not in range 1-5

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Co-Applicant sex does not = 5; however, co-applicant ethnicity = 5 and/or co-applicant race field 1 = 8.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: If no co-applicant, co-applicant sex/ethnicity/race combination invalid

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Income must be numeric and > 0, or equal NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Income is zero, missing, negative or, if non-numeric, does not equal NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If property type = 3, then income must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Property type = 3; therefore income must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Type of purchaser must = 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Type of purchaser must be in range 0-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If type of purchaser = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9, then action taken type must be 1 or 6.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Type of purchaser in range 1-9; therefore action taken should equal 1 or 6

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If type of purchaser = 2, then loan type must = 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Purchaser type = 2 and loan type does not equal 2, 3, or 4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If (agency code = 2, 3, 5, 7, or 9) or (agency code = 1 and action taken not = 3 or 7), then reasons for denial must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, or blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Reasons for denial are not blank or in range 1-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Responses for reasons for denial must not be the same (i.e. 1,1; 1,1,2; 1,2,2;...........).
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Reasons for denial are the same

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If agency code = 1 and action taken = 3 or 7, then at least one reason for denial must be provided and must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, or 9. Other reasons for denial must = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 or blank.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: For action taken = 3 or 7, at least one reason for denial not given, or reason for denial given not in range 1-9

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Rate spread must be in the NN.NN format, must not = blank, and if NA, left justified.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Rate spread is not in valid format or is missing

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 2-8, then rate spread must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 2-8; therefore rate spread must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 1, then rate spread must be > 1.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 1; therefore rate spread must be in range ≥ 1.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 2, then rate spread must be > 3.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 2; therefore rate spread must be in range ≥ 3.5% and ≤ 99.99% or NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then rate spread must = NA.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 3; therefore rate spread must = NA

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 2-5, 7, or 8, HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 2-5, 7, or 8; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: HOEPA status must = 1 or 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: HOEPA status is missing or does not = 1 or 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1, then HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then HOEPA status must = 2.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status = 3; therefore HOEPA status must = 2

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: Lien status must = 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Lien status is missing or not in range 1-4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1 or 3, then lien status must = 1, 2, or 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Loan purpose = 1 or 3; therefore lien status must = 1, 2, or 4

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8, then lien status must = 1, 2, or 3.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8; therefore lien status must = 1, 2, or 3

Loan/Application Register (only).Edit Test: If action taken type = 6, then lien status must = 4.
Loan/Application Register (only).Error Explanation: Action taken type = 6; therefore lien status must = 4

Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: If respondent is a bank, savings association, or independent mortgage company, and if any parent company exists, then parent name, address, city, state and zip code should not = blank.
Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Parent name, address, city, state, or zip code is missing

Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: Institution address should not = parent address.
The reported Tax ID number on the transmittal sheet of your HMDA data file does not match the Tax ID number reported in the previous calendar year submission.
Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Tax ID number on TS does not match the Tax ID number reported in the previous calendar year submission

Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Edit Test: The number of loan/application records received in this transmission file per respondent does not = the total number of loan/application records reported in this respondent’s transmission or the total number of loan/application records in this submission is missing from the transmittal sheet.
Quality: Transmittal Sheet (only).Error Explanation: Loan/application records received in this transmission are missing or not = to the total number of loan/application records reported in this transmission

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: Date application received should =activity year or (activity year minus 1 or activity year minus 2).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Date application received is not in activity year or (activity year minus 1 or activity year minus 2); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If purchaser type = 1 or 3, then loan type should = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Purchaser type = 1 or 3; therefore loan type should = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If loan amount and income are numeric and > 0 and the loan amount is ≥ $1,000 ($1 million), then loan amount should be < 5 times the income.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan amount reported is ≥ five times the income; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If property type =1 and income ≤ $200 thousand, then loan amount should be < $2 million.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Income is < $200 thousand and loan amount reported is ≥ $2 million; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If loan type = 2 and property type = 1 or 2, then loan amount should be ≤ $729 ($729 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan type = 2 and loan amount > $729 ($729 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If loan type = 3 and property type = 1 or 2, then loan amount should be ≤ $729 ($729 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan type = 3 and loan amount > $729 ($729 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If type of purchaser = 1-4, and property type = 1 or 2, then loan amount should be ≤ $729 ($729 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Type of purchaser = 1-4, and property type = 1 or 2 and loan amount > $729 ($729 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If property type = 3, then loan amount should be in the range of $100 thousand and $10 million.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan amount is not within the expected range of $100 thousand and $10 million; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If property type = 2, then loan amount should be ≤ $150 ($150 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Property type = 2 and loan amount reported is > $150 ($150 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If lien status = 2, then loan amount should be ≤ $250 ($250 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Lien status = 2 and loan amount reported is > $250 ($250 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If lien status = 3, then loan amount should be ≤ $100 ($100 thousand).
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Lien status = 3 and loan amount reported is > $100 ($100 thousand); Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If loan purpose = 1 and property type = 1, then loan amount should be > $10 thousand.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan amount is numeric and ≤ $10 thousand; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1, then action taken date should not equal the date application received.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Loan is originated and action taken date = date application received; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Transaction Item(s): Applicant Ethnicity, Race, Sex (Columns O, Q, S)
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7, or 8, and (application date ≥ 20040101 and not = NA), then applicant ethnicity, race and/or sex should not = 4, 7, or 4, respectively.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity, race and/or sex = 4, 7, or 4, respectively; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Transaction Item(s): Co-Applicant Ethnicity, Race, Sex (Columns P, R, T)
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8 (application date ≥ 20040101 and not = NA), and applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4,7,4, respectively, and co-applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4,7,4, respectively, and there is no co-applicant, then co-applicant ethnicity, race, and sex should = 5,8,5, respectively.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity, race and/or sex = 4, 7, 4, respectively, and co-applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4, 7, 4, respectively; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If income is numeric, then income should be < $2 million.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Income is numeric and ≥ to $2 million; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1, and income and loan amount are numeric, and loan amount is > 5 times income, then income should be > $ 9 thousand.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1, loan amount is > 5 times income, and income is numeric and < $9 thousand; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7 or 8, and property type = 1 or 2, then applicant income should not = NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Income = NA; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4, 7, and 4, respectively, and co-applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4, 7, and 4 or 5, 8, and 5, respectively, then applicant income should = NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Income is numeric; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If HOEPA status = 1 and action taken type = 1, then rate spread should not = NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: HOEPA status = 1 and action taken type =1, therefore rate spread should not = NA; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If purchaser type = 1-4 and lien status = 1 or 2, then rate spread should be ≤ 10% or NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Purchaser type = 1-4 and lien status = 1 or 2; therefore rate spread should be ≤ 10% or NA; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If agency = 5, property type = 1, lien status = 1 and action taken type = 1, rate spread should be ≤ 5% or NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Agency = 5, property type = 1, lien status = 1 and action taken type = 1; therefore, rate spread should be ≤ 5% or NA; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If rate spread does not = NA, then rate spread should be < 13%.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Rate spread does not = NA; therefore rate spread should be < 13%; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If agency = 1, 2, 3, 7 or 9, action taken type = 1, loan purpose = 2 or 3, lien status = 1, and rate spread > 8%, then HOEPA status should = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Agency = 1-3, 7 or 9, action taken type = 1, loan purpose = 2 or 3, lien status = 1, and rate spread > 8%; therefore HOEPA status should = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If agency = 1, 2, 3, 7 or 9, action taken type = 1, loan purpose = 2 or 3, lien status = 2, and rate spread > 10%, then HOEPA status should = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Agency = 1-3, 7 or 9, action taken type =1, loan purpose = 2 or 3, lien status = 2, and rate spread > 10%; therefore HOEPA status should = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If agency = 5, HOEPA status should not = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Agency = 5 and HOEPA status = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4, 7, and 4, respectively, HOEPA status should not = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Applicant ethnicity, race and sex = 4, 7, and 4, respectively and HOEPA status = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If property type = 3, HOEPA status should not = 1.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Property type = 3 and HOEPA status = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: Purchaser type = 1 or 3 and HOEPA status = 1; Verify

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If loan type = 3 or 4, then property type should not = 3.

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Transaction Item(s): MSA/MD,State,County,Census Tract (Columns K, L, M, N)
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If the reported state/county combination (when county is small and reported tract equals NA), or state/county/census tract combination is valid then the MSA/MD should not = NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: MSA/MD = NA and state/county (when county is small and tract equals NA), or state/county/census tract is a valid combination and is located completely in an MSA/MD

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Transaction Item(s): MSA/MD,State,County, Census Tract (Columns K, L, M, N)

Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1-5, 7, or 8, then MSA/MD must = a corresponding respondent, MSA/MD combination on respondent panel, or NA.
Quality: Loan Application Register (only.Error Explanation: MSA/MD not on respondent panel

The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Edit Test: If property type = 3, then the total number of these loan applications should be < 10% of all loan applications or < 10% of the total dollar amount of all loan applications reported.

The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Edit Test: If action taken type = 1 or 6, purpose of loan = 1 or 3, property type = 1 or 2, loan type = 1; and if the percentage of these loans that are sold to Fannie Mae or Freddie Mac in the current year is less than the percentage of the same type of loans sold to Fannie Mae or Freddie Mac in the prior year, then the percentage difference between the two years should be less than 10%; or if the number of these loans for the current year is >= 10,000, then the percentage of these loans sold to Fannie Mae or Freddie Mac for the current year should be > 20%.

The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1 or 6, loan purpose = 1 or 3, property type = 1 or 2, loan type = 3. Please verify type of purchaser field is correct.

The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Edit Test: If 250 or greater loans are reported with purpose of loan = 1, action taken type = 1 or 6, property type = 1 or 2, and loan type = 2 or 3, then of these loans, the percentage of loans sold should be > 20%.
The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1 or 6, loan purpose = 1, property type = 1 or 2, loan type = 2 or 3. If 250 or greater of these loans are reported in the current year, then of these loans, the percentage sold should be > 20%

The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Edit Test: If 750 or greater loans are reported with purpose of loan = 1, action taken type = 1 or 6, property type = 1 or 2, then of these loans, the difference between the percentage of loans that are sold in the current year and the percentage of the same type of loans sold in the prior year should be less than (+ or -) 20%.
The Macro Quality Edit Report contains t.Error Explanation: Action taken type = 1 or 6, loan purpose = 1, property type = 1 or 2. If 750 or greater loans of these loans are reported in the current year, then of these loans, the difference in the percentage of loans that are sold in the current year and the percentage of loans sold in the prior year should be less than (+ or -) 20%. Percent of government backed home purchases = # home purchase loans where loan type = 2 or 3 / # home purchase loans for the current year or previous year

If 750 or greater loans of these loans are reported in the current year, then of these loans, the difference in the percentage of loans that are sold in the current year and the percentage of loans sold in the prior year should be less than (+ or -) 20%. Percent of government backed home refinancings = # refinancing loans where loan type = 2 or 3 / # refinancing loans for the current year or previous year
